title: Quiz 1 - Puzzles
instruction:
Directions (Q. 21 – 25): Study the following instruction carefully and answer the question given below.

Eight persons U, V, W, X, Y, Z, A and B live in a building but not necessarily in the same order. There are eight floors in that building and only one person lives on each floor. Each of them likes different flowers, viz Rose, Lotus, Lily, Sunflower, Marigold, Hibiscus, Jasmine and Daffodil but not necessarily in the same order. Each of them also likes a different colour, viz Red, White, Green, Blue, Black, Yellow, Pink and Orange but not necessarily in the same order. The lowermost floor of the building is numbered 1, the one above it is numbered 2 and so on. The topmost floor of the building is numbered 8.

The one who likes Green also likes Hibiscus and lives on the floor numbered six. X likes Daffodil and lives on the floor numbered three. The one who likes Sunflower lives on the ground floor. B lives on the topmost floor. The one who likes Lily lives exactly between the floors on which the one who likes Yellow and the one who likes Blue live. The one who likes White also likes Marigold and the one who likes red also likes Rose. Y likes Lotus and he does not live on the floor numbered five. A lives on the floor numbered seven. The one who likes White does not live on the topmost floor or the second floor. The one who likes Jasmine lives on the floor numbered five. Z does not likes Jasmine. W lives on an even-numbered floor. The one who likes Blue also like Jasmine and the one who likes Pink also like Lotus. V and the one who likes Black live on even – numbered floor.

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true?
options: R’s husband lives immediately above the one who is shooting for Firangi.
S lives immediately above U’s mother’s floor.
Only three people live between T and the one who is shooting for Badshah.
T’s sister-in-law is shooting for PK.
All the given statements are true.

quiz.text: Who among the following lives exactly between the third floor and the one who is shooting for Tubelight?
options: U’s brother Q
U’s wife
R’s father
S’s grandfather
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following pair by represents vacant floors?
options: 4, 6
2, 6
4, 8
2, 8
None of the above

quiz.text: How many floors are there between U’s mother’s floor and S’s floor?
options: None
Four
Three
Five
Two

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which one of them does not belong to that group?
options: S’s father – Insaf
Q – Firangi
R’s brother-in-law – Insaf
S – Tubelight
R – Rangoon

quiz.text: Who among the following lives on the seventh floor?
options: Q
R
S
None
None of the above

quiz.text: Who among the following likes Daffodil?
options: H
M
K
F
None of the above

quiz.text: Who was born exactly between the one who likes Marigold and J?
options: H
M
F
L

options: Hibiscus
Marigold
Sunflower
Daffodil

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is not correct?

M – Marigold

options: Sanskrit
Punjabi
Hindi
English

quiz.text: Which of the following food does P like?
options: Punjabi

Sindhi

quiz.text: According to the given information, which of the following combinations of person and place is correct?
options: U – Haryana
Q – Delhi
S – Himachal Pradesh
T – Rajasthan
None is correct

options: Punjabi
Marwari

options: Sanskrit
Punjabi
Hindi
English

quiz.text: What is the total number of chocolates in the Yellow box and the Brown box together?
options: 13
17
15
20
18

quiz.text: How many boxes are placed between the Brown box and the Green box?
options: One
Three
Four
Two

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is correct?
options: 6 – Blue – 5 Star
12 – Orange – Snicker
7 – Green – Twix
15 – Black – Munch
3 – Brown – Dairy Milk

quiz.text: Which of the following boxes contains Twix?
options: Green
Black
Red
Orange
Blue

quiz.text: Which of the following boxes are placed immediately above and below the box that contains Perk?
options: The boxes that contain Dairy Milk and Toblerone respectively
The Pink box and the Blue box respectively
The boxes that contain Munch and Snicker respectively
The Red box and the Orange box respectively
The boxes that contain Dairy Milk and Munch respectively

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and hence form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: B – Blue
Z – Yellow
X – Green
A – Black
U – Red

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is true?
options: B – Floor number – 7 – Red – Rose
U – Floor number – 5 – Blue – Hibiscus
A – Floor number – 7 – White – Marigold
W – Floor number – 4 – Orange – Lily
None of the above

quiz.text: Who among the following likes Yellow?
options: The one who likes Daffodil
The one who likes Sunflower
The one who likes Hibiscus
The one who likes Rose

quiz.text: How many persons live between B and the one who likes Hibiscus?

quiz.text: Who among the following lives on the fourth floor?
options: U
V
B
A
